RT @HollywoodTheatr: In two weeks, we'll be screening the only known 35mm print of Akira Kurosawa's DERSU UZALA. A lost Russian explorer in…

In two weeks, we'll be screening the only known 35mm print of Akira Kurosawa's DERSU UZALA. A lost Russian explorer in Siberia is rescued by a local and learns just what it will take to survive.

See DERSU UZALA Saturday-Sunday, March 5-6.

https://t.co/bxB7scbRiZ https://t.co/FgQ2gUoqQJ
